channel.title: Can't think of title..just read
channel.description: i'm curious to see, do all the ppL making trance, or house, techno music, etc. do u think making that type of music as a beginner made u a better music producer overall? meaning, if u can make a sicc trance dubstep track, can u make anything? like hip hop beat or trap.. cuz i see ther's a ton of crazy sh%t in techno track compared to a hip hop beat. i don't listen to techno, but it's cool.. i jus love rap/hip-hop & r&b..but shud i learn to make wat u guys are makin to become a better artist?

item.title: Can't think of title..just read
item.dc:creator: LunarAura
item.description:
Trap, Trance, and House is a whole lot simpler than making Dubstep. I learned how to make dubstep on a PC DAW and I can do alot of genres now but I still don‚Äôt know how to make a jazzy track. I can also try making a trap beat but without vocals, I dont have anything to put in the trap beat.

This was all in FL studio though so I wouldn‚Äôt recommend trying to learn one genre to learn them all. All you really need to do in Auxy is pick good sounds and a kick set and then place notes and then sidechain. Sound design and mastering is already done for you. Its simple and nice

Read full topic

item.title: Can't think of title..just read
item.dc:creator: SynthwaveGoose
item.description:
Do all kind of music what you like - put a lot of your feelings (bad or good) in it and your music becomes better. I like rock and orchestral music, but can write in pretty all genres. One thing - it must be sincerely. So for beginner in my opinion best way to create good music it‚Äôs find some harmony in process of music making. If you find it, you will find satisfaction in what you doing. Put emotions in your work and it will alive;)

Read full topic
